value:
$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It is prophecy, Fjorm! "Two gods war,
their champions spill blood...$k$p"Ice melts while the flame remains...$k$p"Pierced by frost, the Flame Gem
rekindles, the champion renewed."$k$pThere is nothing we can do to change
what has already been decided!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I... I can't!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Princess Fjorm! ...If you do nothing
to stop me, I will kill you.$k$pIf you want to live, you must fight!
You will have to kill me first!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,255|$Fi500|I won't! ...I REFUSE!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...Fjorm. Think.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|I've had enough.$k$pYou, Nifl's champion... Fight or die.$k$pAnd you, dog, deal the killing blow!$k$pI command it, and you must obey!
You do understand that by now,
don't you? Hah!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Princess Fjorm...$k$pI have done all I can. This is it.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...No! Princess Laegjarn!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm. Use the power I've given you
and strike down your enemy.$k$pDo so, or die!$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|B-but I...I can't!$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Now!$k$p$Fo1500,255,0,0,255|$WmMPID_開花レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Bloom01,Face|$Fi1500|GYAAAHHH!$k$p$WmMPID_開花フィヨルム味方,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Bloom01,Face|$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,255|$Fi500|Hrrr-RAAAHHH!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm...$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Ho-ho! What a sight to behold!
Simultaneous strikes!$k$pWho will make it out alive?!
I wonder...$k$p$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|$w0|...$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Gya-hahaha! Good, good, good.
And just as I had planned.$k$pLooks as if I've won, Nifl!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm hesitated to do harm from
the very start.$k$pAnd now...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Pain|My life...was forfeit long ago...
I knew that.$k$p...Princess Laegjarn, I...I've regretted
being unable to save you... All this
time, ever since...$k$pI told myself...never again...$k$pI won't...lose you. Not again.$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm...$k$p...It's happening again. Another
one lost...$k$p

$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Hah! You put on quite the show, dog!$k$pLook at me. Let me see that face
now that you've murdered that
little friend of yours.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Curse you, Múspell...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,0,0,255|$Fi1000|$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|It is you who is cursed! Cursed to do
exactly as I command, lest you forget.
And I have a new command: kill Nifl.$k$pDo not think you can turn on me with
your job left unfinished!$k$pNow be a good dog, and sic.
Kill her!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hng...$k$pGrrr-RAAH!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...Tyah!$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Is it time for me to join in on the fun?
Two against one seems like some
long odds, Nifl... What WILL you do?$k$pYour champion is dead. What else is
there for YOU to do...but die!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Múspell...$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Hah! I'll savor this...taking you apart.
I only wish you had a better view so
you could watch it happen.$k$pThat woman of yours—Hvergel, yes?
I always was disappointed you missed
seeing her die.$k$pTragic really. She didn't have the
endurance I'd hoped, and my flame
burned right through her.$k$pThe screaming ended before the fun
truly began, but not before she
cursed you, Nifl...$k$pYou, the god that drove her to
her death!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Liar.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Hah! It's the truth! The only lie is the
love you claimed you held for her!$k$pNow it's your turn to feel the lick
of my flame and die in your regret,
entirely unloved!$k$pYou have nowhere to run, no allies to
turn to. You have...NO ONE!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...Yes, she does.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|Hm?!$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_開花フィヨルム味方,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Bloom01,Face|$Fi3000|I am her ally.$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...Fjorm?!$k$p$WmMPID_開花フィヨルム味方,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Bloom01,Face|In Nifl's name...$k$pMúspell, become ice.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,255,255,255|$Fi1000|$w0|Wha— What is this?!$k$pThis... You... You were dead!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|That's right. Princess Fjorm died...$k$pYou said it yourself, Múspell...$k$p"Two gods war, their champions
spill blood...$k$p"Ice melts while the flame remains...$k$p"Pierced by frost, the Flame Gem
rekindles, the champion renewed."$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|GRRAAHH!$k$pDamn you all! This is not what the
prophecy was meant to foretell!$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|Fjorm gave her life up, pierced
by her own frost.$k$pShe could not strike her trusted
friend and ally.$k$pShe entrusted her life to that friend
without hesitation.$k$pMúspell, your foul influence
ends now...$k$pAll that you are dies here.$k$p$WmMEID_ムスペル,ch00_38_Muspell_M_Normal,Face|...Hahaha! GAH-HAHAHA!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,255,255,255|$Fi1000|$w0|Remember this, you three... Never
forget! I will return... And I will settle
the score!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,255,255,255|$Fi1000|$w0|In the gathering twilight...I will return...
And no one will survive...$k$pNo one!$k$pI WILL RAIN DEATH ON
THIS WORLD!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|$w0|...It is done.$k$pThe flame will fade, and ice will
return to the land... I, too, may now
fade away.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Lady Nifl...for everything.
Even if I—$k$p$WmMEID_ニフル,ch00_37_Nifl_F_Normal,Face|...Silence. Mortal gratitude is of no
consequence.$k$pIf you still see things so simply,
perhaps it's best you live out what
life remains in that threadbare body.$k$p...Be happy, Fjorm.$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|$Fi3000|$w0|Lady Nifl...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|...Princess Fjorm.$k$pI also want to thank you. Even facing
me as your foe, your belief in me
never wavered.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Smile|You were not my foe, Princess
Laegjarn...$k$p$EFace_Blush|Do you remember...the last thing
you said to me?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes. I remember.$k$p$EFace_Blush|Suppose we had chosen a different
path back in Nifl... Could we have
been friends?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Blush|Yes.$k$pThat was the moment we were no
longer foes, and we became friends.$k$p$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|
